comments:
In a new java project with the SWT library added create a new visual class 
extending a SWT Composite.
Drag, drop and draw a SWT Group container on to the Composite, and set the text 
of the Group.
Click the Save button, then click back to the Composite to produce this NPE...

Error Dec 09, 2004 11:19:36.486 java.lang.NullPointerException

Composite to reproduce the NPE again.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 70607 ***
